document_data.mainbody: 'Marren''' was a monk at the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]].
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], Marren and some other monks were kidnapped by cultists of the [[Cult of the Howling Hatred]], who planned to use them in a new plot to access an [[elemental node]]. In a room of the node's complex under the monastery, thanks to the elemental forces, Marren's body was switched that of a cultist, [[Luros]]. Later, he met an adventuring party hired by Grandmaster [[Perrywinkle Shin]] to find the missing monks. The adventurers managed to put Marren back in his body.
